category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_default_find_inside_parts
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether parts inside or outside the 3D bounding box during a spatial search are searched by default. Applies to spatial searches in the Structure Manager, Multi Structure Manager, and Manufacturing Process Planner applications. Valid values are true - Parts inside the 3D bounding box are searched by default. false - Parts outside the 3D bounding box are searched by default.
